name: Voxel Terrain Gen Slow Mo FPS
name_original: Voxel Terrain Gen Slow Mo FPS
description: Just a game I am working on. This could turn into a fully fledged game. I don't know. Please try it out and give any feedback. WASD to move. Space to Jump. Right click to exit the game(Don't ask why). You are on a 16 x 16 chunk of blocks(of course from Minecraft) and everything is in slow motion unless you are pressing a button. This is not meant to be anything at the moment. This is just so I can test ideas. Please give ideas in the comments. Currently there is a bug where the camera rotates by itself. From what I can gather, this is not from my code.
